com.drgarbage.draw2d

Class ControlFlowGraphFigure

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.draw2d.Figure
      • org.eclipse.draw2d.Layer
        • org.eclipse.draw2d.LayeredPane
          • com.drgarbage.draw2d.ControlFlowGraphFigure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.draw2d.IFigure

    public class ControlFlowGraphFigure
extends org.eclipse.draw2d.LayeredPane
    Embeded Control Flow Graph Viewer. It used for representation of method control flow graphs from a text editor.The nodes of the control flow graphs are synchronized with method lines in the text editor.
    Version:
    $Revision:25 $ $Id:ControlFlowGraphFigure.java 235 2007-06-22 18:48:35Z aleks $
    Author:
    Sergej Alekseev

    • Nested Class Summary

      protected class  ControlFlowGraphFigure.RoutedConnectionsLayer
